summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Menu Creation Platform. All core features working correctly including JWT authentication, template gallery (10 templates), menu CRUD operations, AI-powered description generation using OpenAI GPT-5.1, and PDF export functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: Logout redirect timeout - page may not redirect properly after logout

passed_tests: Menu CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Menu item addition with form validation
AI description generation using OpenAI GPT-5.1
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Logout functionality has a redirect timeout issue. The logout action works but page redirect to show login button times out after 5 seconds.
